name: Twini
description: Twini empowers brands and content creators to engage and monetize their communities on autopilot. We provide AI twins, custom-trained on your content, that think and talk like you--allowing for personalized, one-on-one interactions at scale.
one_liner: Twini empowers brands and content creators to engage and monetize their communities on autopilot. We provide AI twins, custom-trained on your content, that think and talk like you--allowing for personalized, one-on-one interactions at scale.
